artview.components.Menu¶

class artview.components.Menu(pathDir, Vradar=None, name='Menu', parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: artview.core.core.Component

Class to display the MainMenu

Methods

Menu.AdvanceFileSelect(findex) Captures a selection and redraws figure with new file.
Menu.CreateMenu() Create the main menubar.
Menu.LaunchApp() Launches a GUI interface.
Menu.__init__(pathDir[, Vradar, name, parent]) Initialize the class to create the interface.
Menu.addAboutMenu() Add Help item to menubar.
Menu.addComponent(Comp) Add Component Contructor.
Menu.addComponentMenu() Add Component item to menu bar.
Menu.addComponentMenuItem(Comp) Add Component item to Component Menu.
Menu.addFileAdvanceMenu() Add an option to advance to next or previous file.
Menu.addFileMenu() Add the File item to menubar.
Menu.addLayoutMenu() Add Layout item to menu bar.
Menu.addLayoutMenuItem(widget) Add widget item to Layout Menu.
Menu.addLayoutWidget(widget) Add a widget to central layout.
Menu.addPlotMenu() Add Plot item to menubar.
Menu.keyPressEvent(event)
Menu.removeLayoutMenuItem(widget) Remove widget item to Layout Menu.
Menu.removeLayoutWidget(widget) Remove widget from central layout.
Menu.showFileDialog() Open a dialog box to choose file.
Menu.startComponent(Comp) GUI start a Component and add to layout.
